DOC.brief_summary: Background study : Manual Therapy apply patient non-specific neck pain investigate several time , internationally nationally . In Netherlands different type manual therapy treatment exist . Manual Therapy , practice Utrecht School , subject randomize controlled trial . There need evaluate effectiveness type manual therapy . Objective study : This trial investigate effectiveness Manual Therapy short long-term 52 week patient ( sub ) acute ( minimal two week ) chronic ( maximum 52 week ) since last episode neck pain . Functional state , pain global perceived effect outcome variable . Study design : The study single blind randomize control trial . Study population : Men woman age 18 70 year old neck pain least two week . Intervention : The experimental group treat manual therapy period six week . The control group treat physical therapy ( usual care ) also period six week . Primary study parameter / outcome study : Global Perceived Effect ( GPE ) Neck disability index ( NDI-DV ) apply . Secondary study parameter / outcome study : Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) pain SF36 ( Quality life ) . The Multidimensional Health Locus Control ( MHLC ) , Credibility/Expectancy Questionnaire , Fear Avoidance Beliefs Questionnaire ( FABQ-DLV ) also measure .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Manual Therapy Patients With Neck Pain .
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed information Manual Therapy accord Utrecht School Manual Therapy ( MTU ) MTU base assess patient 's individual preference function document interpret natural asymmetry anatomical form , posture movement . The normal asymmetry variability human form movement function specify . Asymmetrical form related asymmetrical movement function . In addition general diagnostics , MTU characterize specific diagnostics . By mean specific manual-therapeutic analysis individual preference function model patient drawn analysis interpretation individual asymmetry form , posture movement . Some explanation measurement movement : ( prefer ) hand folding ; ( prefer ) arm folding ; eye master eye ; leg use ( prefer ) kick ball . The purpose describe optimal direction position movement ax joint accord model . When compose model , firstly individual characteristic ( number prefer movement , number asymmetrical aspect posture form ) assess . Documentation , notation interpretation characteristic take place accord protocol . The objective MTU optimize position movement axes joint . To achieve , three-dimensional movement joint execute repeatedly . To purpose fully position movement ax therapist ( repeatedly ) perform passive joint movement low velocity high accuracy . In addition examine individual preference movement , exploratory examination carry recognize possible red flag determine treatment indication . Treatment base preferred movement find patient interpretation accord protocol movement complaint patient . It execute apply passive articular movement spinal joint joint extremity . During process physiological joint limitation carefully observe ; traction high-velocity movement apply , may case form manual therapy . The diagnostic examination form manual therapy focus joint function , stability , movement pattern , range movement , severity disorder . To diagnose patient complaint , palpation passive accessory passive intervertebral movement use . The result yield information tenderness ( pain ) , restrict intersegmental motion ( stiffness ) , spasm ( muscle tension ) .
